00065 void MseFillProfileNewX::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00066 {

00077 void MseFillProfileNewX::SetValues(const AnaFillResult &afr, EPolarimeterId polId, ETargetOrient tgtOrient)
00078 {
00079    fill           = afr.GetFillId();
00080    polarimeter_id = polId;
00081    target_orient  = tgtOrient;
00082    target_id      = afr.GetPCTarget(polId).fTargetId;
00083 
00084    prof_r          = afr.GetPCProfR(polId, tgtOrient).first;
00085    prof_r_err      = afr.GetPCProfR(polId, tgtOrient).second;
00086    prof_r0         = afr.GetPCProfR0(polId, tgtOrient).first;
00087    prof_r0_err     = afr.GetPCProfR0(polId, tgtOrient).second;
00088    prof_rslope     = afr.GetPCProfRSlope(polId, tgtOrient).first;
00089    prof_rslope_err = afr.GetPCProfRSlope(polId, tgtOrient).second;
